items.name: All terrain vehicle - type 1
items.description: The type 1 vehicle has good all-round capability, internal seating for 6 plus 2 external positions.

items.name: All terrain vehicle - type 4
items.description: The type 4 vehicle is larger than the type 1, with additional defensive capability, and internal seating for 8 plus 2 external positions.

items.name: Transporter - personnel fixtures
items.description: Basic bus-type transporter suitable for carrying 24 personnel plus personal kits.

items.name: Transporter - equipment fixtures
items.description: Equipment transporter, maximum capacity 5T.

items.name: Transporter - combination fixtures
items.description: Transporter with dual-purpose equipment fittings, suitable for 12 personnel plus a large equipment bay.

items.name: Diesel - 50L can
items.description: 50L can of diesel fuel suitable for all ATVs and transporters.

items.name: Rifle - standard issue, fully automatic
items.description: Fully-automatic rifle using standard ammunition.

items.name: Rifle - sniper
items.description: Bolt-action rifle with enhanced scope; requires standard ammunition.

items.name: Sidearm - semi-automatic pistol, standard issue
items.description: Officer's sidearm

items.name: Machinegun - heavy duty, .50 calibre, belt-fed
items.description: Squad machinegun, belt-fed.

items.name: Ammunition - standard clip
items.description: Standard clip of ammunition for rifles and sidearms.

items.name: Ammunition - standard clip, 10% tracers (blue)
items.description: Standard clip of ammunition for rifles and sidearms, with 1 out of 10 rounds as blue tracers.

items.name: Ammunition - .50 calibre belt
items.description: Ammunition for belt-fed machineguns, in metal case.

items.name: Ammunition - .50 calibre magazine, 10% tracers (red)
items.description: Ammunition for belt-fed machineguns, with 1 out of 10 rounds as red tracers, in metal case

items.name: Ammunition - .50 calibre magazine, 5% tracers (green)
items.description: Ammunition for belt-fed machineguns, with 1 out of 20 rounds as green tracers, in metal case

items.name: Body armour - vest
items.description: Standard body armour, covers the torso only.  Wash before return.

items.name: Body armour - suit, light
items.description: Full suit of body armour, covers torse, thighs, arms and includes helmet.  Wash before return.

items.name: Rations - standard, daily per person
items.description: One day of standard rations for one person.

items.name: Rations - formula++, daily per person
items.description: One day of high-activity rations for one person.

items.name: Survival rations - imperishable, weekly per squad
items.description: One week of highly imperishable food for 12 people.

items.name: Communication kit - standard (base + 6 stations)
items.description: Standard communication kit with base and 6 receivers.

items.name: Communication kit - additional station
items.description: Additional station for standard communication kit (base supports up to 12 receivers).
